thread.title: Korn Ferry to Report Quarterly Earnings via Live Webcast on March 6, 2018

author: cnbc.com
title: Korn Ferry to Report Quarterly Earnings via Live Webcast on March 6, 2018
text:
LOS ANGELES--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Korn Ferry (NYSE:KFY) today announced that the firm will release financial results for the fiscal year 2018 third quarter (ended January 31, 2018) on Tuesday, March 6, 2018.
A news release will be issued after the market closes on Tuesday, March 6, 2018, followed by a live webcast at 4:30 p.m. ET. The webcast will be hosted by Gary Burnison, Chief Executive Officer and Robert Rozek, Chief Financial Officer.
What: Korn Ferry to Report Q3 FY2018 Earnings Investor Live Webcast Who: Gary Burnison, Chief Executive Officer Robert Rozek, Chief Financial Officer Gregg Kvochak, Senior Vice President, Investor Relations When: 4:30 p.m. ET, Tuesday, March 6, 2018 Where: Live audio webcast and accompanying slides will be available at the following site: http://ir.kornferry.com/phoenix.zhtml?c=100800&p=irol-irhome
About Korn Ferry
Korn Ferry is a global organizational consulting firm. We help companies design their organization â€“ the structure, the roles and responsibilities, as well as how they compensate, develop and motivate their people. As importantly, we help organizations select and hire the talent they need to execute their strategy. Our approximately 7,000 colleagues serve clients in more than 50 countries.
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180221006532/en/
Korn Ferry
Investor Relations: Gregg Kvochak, (310) 556-8550
For Media: Dan Gugler, (310) 226-2645
Source: Korn Ferry
